propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.color: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.
propDescriptions.disableAnimation: If true, the transition animation is disabled.
propDescriptions.error: If true, the label is displayed in an error state.
propDescriptions.focused: If true, the input of this label is focused.
propDescriptions.margin: If dense, will adjust vertical spacing. This is normally obtained via context from FormControl.
propDescriptions.required: if true, the label will indicate that the input is required.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

focused.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

disabled.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

error.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

required.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

asterisk.description: Pseudo-class applied to the asterisk element.

formControl.description: Styles applied to the root element if the component is a descendant of `FormControl`.

sizeSmall.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

shrink.description: Styles applied to the `input` element if {{conditions}}.

animated.description: Styles applied to the `input` element unless {{conditions}}.

filled.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

outlined.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.
